mapper.select: SELECT A.CLASS_NO,A.MEMBER_NO,B.MANAGER_NAME, B.CLASS_NAME, B.ADMIN_NO FROM ENROLL A JOIN CLASS B ON(A.CLASS_NO=B.CLASS_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY B.ADMIN_NO

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, C.CLASS_NAME, C.CLASS_NO FROM ENROLL E INNER JOIN CLASS C ON (E.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO) INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (E.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.ADMIN_NO = #{adminNo} ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO
SELECT CLASS_NAME, CLASS_NO FROM CLASS WHERE ADMIN_NO = #{adminNo}
